message.body: Yeah, I'm totally flexible with anything & am also only staying in town Sat. evening. I'll be arriving downtown tomorrow AM, so just let me know when you're free & we can meet up!
I'm free tomorrow from like 9am until 7pm (:

Ok I just found out I have to do this dog sit so I will be in center city tomorrow when u arrive. Then I just have to go back at 5 for a walk and then stay the night at 11 or 12. Just gime a call when you get in and we will work things out.
Sweet, fun with dogs! Thanks & I'll call you from downtown in the morning (: I'll be at 400 Arch Street!
That's not far from where I'll be. We could get b fast at reading terminal market and get supplies if you wana cook while u r here
Hey, did you make it into town? Where are you at?
We're still on the road, likely arriving 10ish. You still downtown ?!?
Yes I'll be in that area
Do you think I need my sleeping bag? Or can I just borrow a sheet or blanket? If I don't have to carry it, I'd save room in my pack... Just wondering (:
